question:
34. A. go B. went C. going D. gone    35. A. stay B. stays C. staying D. stayed

36. A. enjoy B. enjoyed C. enjoying D. enjoys

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

34. B. Went

35. D. Stayed

36. B. Enjoyed

Penjelasan: Simple Past Tense menggunakan kata kerja bentuk ke dua atau Verb 2

go-went

stay-stayed

enjoy-enjoyed

hope you find this helpful^•^

Jawaban:

34.went

35stayed

36enjoyed

Penjelasan:

semua dlm bentuk simple past tense krn sdh lampau

related_questions.question:
There____some cute cats on the sofa a. Am b. is c. are d. does
secepatnya ya​

answers.answer:
there are some cute cats on the sofa

Penjelasan:

c) are

====================================

C. Are

Pembahasan

Untuk benda yang hanya ada 1 atau tunggal kita menggunakan "There is" , Sedangkan benda yang lebih dari 1 atau jamak maka kita menggunakan "There are".

Maka di pertanyaan tersebut kita menggunakan "There are". Karena ada beberapa hewan atau pada teks tersebut dijelaskan "some cute cats on the sofa" yang artinya beberapa kucing lucu di sofa.

====================================

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin
26. Who teaches (mengajar) Math?
Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does
27. Who teaches Biology ?
a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does
28. Today is Sunday. The day after tomorrow is ....
a. Monday
c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

24. A. 2

25. C. light skin

26. A. Mr. Heru does

27. C. Mrs. Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadiin jawaban tercerdas yak✌

Jawaban:

24. B.3

25. B.She doesn't

26. A.Mr Heru does

27. C. Mrs Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

Penjelasan:

24. Mrs.Retno, Mrs.Terno, Mr. Heru

25. The one with the light skin is Mrs. Terno

26. Mr Heru is a math teacher

27. The biology teacher ia Mrs. Retno

28. Today : Sunday

Tommorow : Monday

After tommorow : Tuesday

related_questions.question:
II.    Fill in the blanks with the correct answers
16. Mrs. Natan is pretty ....... (guru)
17. Diligent means in Indonesia is......
18. Smart mean in Indonesia is
19. Clever mean in Indonesia is
A Rajin
B Teacher
C Pintar
D Drinks
E Tree
F Is
G GO
20. She .......
a diligent girl
21. They ........... to the library by bus
22. Shinta ..........
...... milk every morning
H Memasak
23. What can you see in the park?
24. My mother likes cook
I Kerja
J cerdas
Cook in Indonesia is .....
25. My father likes go to work
Work in Indonesia is .......
Text for question number 1-5​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

16. pretty teacher

17. rajin

18. pandai / cerdas

19. pintar

20. she is

21. went

22. drink

23. ini gatau gw

24. memasak

25. bekerja

semoga terbantu ya✌

Jawaban:

A) Live

Penjelasan:

Most bears live in northern parts of the world. (Kebanyakan beruang tinggal di bagian utara dari bumi.)

Kalimat tersebut adalah kalimat pemberitahuan sehingga bentuknya menggunakan Simple Present atau menggunakan bentuk V1.

Pada kalimat tersebut, kata kerja didahului oleh subjek berjumlah majemuk(lebih dari satu) yang ditandai adanya huruf S di belakang kata Bear. Artinya, ada lebih dari satu beruang. Karena terdapat huruf S pada subjek maka kata kerja yang akan diisi tidak memerlukan huruf S.

Contoh:

Cats eat food.

Cat eats food.

V1 V2 Ving

Live Lived Living

Sehingga, jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Live

related_questions.question:
11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^
